column1: "Goblinoid Dungeon Mastering System was built to as a inspirational storytelling companion to creatives of all sorts."
"GDMS was built to supply that little bit of inspiration the human brain needs to start whirring."
"Special thanks to Kristina Michael Scout Jake Vieira and the Durfee High School Tabletop Club."
"GDMS is inspired by the minimalism and simplicity of classic TTRPGS and amazing OSR releases like Shadowdark, Old School Essentials, Maze Rats, and many more."
"GDMS was created in 2020 and ported to pocket version by Alexander Sousa in Providence Rhode Island in 2026."
